answers.answer: I was anemic and my son was very small and had heart decells right away when I started labor. I had to have an emergency c section. Please start taking extra iron.
I'm extra tired and have awful headaches. I also get splotches on my legs and I'm winded more easily

@mommy2kayden oh my thats a scary thought ! Sorry you went through that and I sure will thank you for sharing !@squigglylc same here ! I've been told I look pale. So as mommy2kayden said take care of yourself
I got anemic with this pregnancy but my dr gave me some iron pills to take along with my prenatals but i do feel tired nd slugish most days
Recently found out I'm anemic which shocked me cz i never had tht. So I'm put on iron pills and have to take my prenatal w iron

I was anemic with my first n was put on iron pills that I hated bcz I made me constipated!! but if i didnt take them i would be really weak n had 2occasions of passing out (before I knew I was anemic).. But ifu take ure prenatals n iron pills u n baby should be fine. Its common in pregnancy

question: Did my Gestational Diabetes test and let me say that drink was grosss ! Too sweet for my liking haha. Anyways , dr called me saying that I don't have diabetes , but I am anemic again :/struggled with that all my life ugh . How does being anemic affect my pregnancy?
title: Anemic while pregnant?!
